Release History
===============


0.4 (2011-03-18)
----------------

- Improve error messages.
- Fix double exception on restart failures.


0.3 (2011-02-16)
----------------

- --exclude/-x specifies mmap'ed objects to ignore.
- Add a little bit of documentation in README.txt.


0.2 (2011-02-14)
----------------

- Packaging issues.

0.1b1
-----

- Initial public release.
